sentences.en: A . alkaline etching and recycling of liquid copper recovery equipment.
sentences.cn: 碱性蚀刻液再生循环利用及铜回收设备.

sentences.en: Bags of plastic bottles are stacked high at a recycling center.
sentences.cn: 袋装的塑料瓶堆积如山.

sentences.en: Cities will have a powerful incentive to discourage recycling.
sentences.cn: 城市将采取有力的措施阻止再循环.

sentences.en: Extensive use of aircraft, plastics recycling is necessary machinery manufacturers.
sentences.cn: 该机用途广泛, 是塑料再生厂家必备机械.

sentences.en: Is the recycling process in itself damaging to the environment?
sentences.cn: 这一回收利用过程本身对环境有害吗？

sentences.en: Oh , these boxes are for recycling. Our family is trying to help the environment.
sentences.cn: 盒子是用来回收废物的. 我们全家人都在为保护环境出力.

sentences.en: Recycling is an issue that has come of age in Britain in the last decade.
sentences.cn: 回收利用是上个十年中被英国民众广泛认可的观念。

sentences.en: Recycling is important to help protect our environment.
sentences.cn: 回收利用对保护环境很重要。

sentences.en: Reducing waste at the source is more important than increasing recycling.
sentences.cn: 从源头减少浪费比增加循环利用要更重要.

sentences.en: Strong freezing system and air output recycling system at high speed.
sentences.cn: 强劲的冷冻系统,高转速的风量再循环系统.

sentences.en: The plastic, paper, and metal are taken to special centers for recycling.
sentences.cn: 塑料, 纸, 和金属被带到专门的回收中心.

sentences.en: The recycling industry is particularly vulnerable to wild cyclical swings in the market.
sentences.cn: 回收工业经受不了市场价格的同期性激烈涨落.

sentences.en: The recycling scheme gets its first try-out in rural Dorset.
sentences.cn: 这些再循环方案在多塞特郡的农村地区首先试用。

sentences.en: These communities are now turning to recycling in large numbers.
sentences.cn: 这些团体现在正转而致力于大规模的回收利用工作。

sentences.en: Voluntary recycling efforts have brought some success.
sentences.cn: 自发的回收利用的努力取得了某些成就.

sentences.en: We should encourage reclamation and recycling.
sentences.cn: 我们应当鼓励废物的回收和利用.

words.tran_cn: 可回收利用的；可再循环的
回收；再循环利用（recycle的现在分词）

trans.tran_en: the process of treating used objects or materials so that they can be used again

trans.tran_cn: 回收利用( recycle的现在分词 )，再利用，再次应用，重新使用（概念、方法、玩笑等）
